channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Atmospheric blocking slows ocean-driven melting of Greenland's largest glacier tongue
item.description: Northeast Greenland is home to the 79 N Glacier -- the country's largest floating glacier tongue, but also one seriously threatened by global warming:...

item.title: Atmospheric Rivers Shape Arctic Moisture
item.description: Atmospheric rivers cross the planet. These large, narrow sections of Earth's atmosphere carry moisture from the tropics to the poles. A recently publi...

item.title: Astronomers catch a glimpse of a uniquely inflated and asymmetric exoplanet
item.description: Astronomers have observed the atmosphere of a hot and uniquely inflated exoplanet using NASA's James Webb Space Telescope.
